body.p: You can export a bundle from an existing NCC environment along with its associated entities and import it to the same or another NCC environment. This is primarily used to export bundles from test to live NCC environments.
Following entities are imported or exported along with the bundle during the bundle import or export:

li.p: Buckets, counters, and tariff rules within charging services
Any embedded rules in charging service, usage control service, threshold, and cap

body.note: Any entities referenced from within the embedded rules (for example, rate used in tariff rule) are not considered as child objects of the bundle. These entities are not imported or exported with the bundle when the Import Bundle or Export Bundle action is performed. In the target NCC, you must create and provision any entity referenced from within any embedded rule.
